description:
Shuusuke`s younger sister.
Everyone she knows thinks she just has a simple brother complex, but deep down inside she thinks it can go much further than that. Whenever she gets the chance she`ll secretly grab some of Shuusuke`s clothes so she gets her brother`s scent, she even keeps a "Big Brother Diary" and will take any opportunity she can to give him a glimpse of her panties.
Although sometimes she also has to distance herself from her perverted brother, just so she can keep up the appearance that they really are just brother and sister.
name: Takanashi Nao
